name: Autumn Walk (JdR2V)
description:
Autumn Walk was made for the Cozy Fall Jam 2021

Enjoy a little walk in a low poly forest, picking items to have a nice picnic under the night sky.

You move with WASD, look around with the mouse and pause the game with "P".

Credits are located on the "Credits" Screen.

This was really fun to make, and it's the first game that I made in more than a year, also, it's my first time using Unreal Engine. If you enjoyed the game, please let me know :D
